title: Awkward Raft

The first full-body drawing made by agent z. It is also the first direct public depiction of the
affiliate YouTube channel AZ Mapping (the countryball on the left) outside of background references from agent z.

title: Countryball!?
description:
The first drawing by agent z. The Poland variant was posted on Twitter, while the other variant
featuring affiliate YouTube channel AZ Mapping was used as a profile picture for agent z Social Media accounts.
